item.title: EP 179 - Marc Dutrox: When True Crime Meets Conspiracy
item.itunes:title: Marc Dutrox: When True Crime Meets Conspiracy
item.description:
Today we look for the grave of Miley Cyrus and then we delve into the dark underworld to uncover the crimes of Marc Dutrox.

International pop star Miley Cyrus has it all. Or had it all as some would think. Was Miley murdered and the woman we know to day just a look a like?

And then we travel to Belgium to investigate the crimes of Marc Dutrox. Was he simply a disgusting career criminal with murder on the mind? Or does his trail of bodies lead to the highest levels of government?

 

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

What does Miley Cyrus's death have to do with James Franco?

http://www.dazeddigital.com/artsandculture/article/20055/1/what-does-miley-cyruss-death-have-to-do-with-james-franco

 

Marc Dutrox

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_Dutroux

 

Belgium's silent heart of darkness

https://www.theguardian.com/world/2002/may/05/dutroux.featuresreview

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
